portfolio.title: Audio Speech Analysis Deep Learning Model
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a deep learning model to analyze and identify the emotions in audio speech, enabling enhanced sentiment analysis capabilities for customer service applications.

portfolio.title: Computer Vision Image Classification Machine Learning Project
portfolio.description: Implemented machine learning algorithms to classify handwritten digits from the MNIST dataset, achieving a 93% accuracy, which significantly reduces error rates in digit recognition systems for automated processing.
